title: Diablo II Eastern Sun with D2Hackit
description:
Brought to you by Pendragon

Diablo II Eastern Sun 3.00R6E4.1N Community Patch with D2Hackit, and all available Eastern Sun D2Hackit modules already installed. Max number of in game players has been increased from 16 to 32 as well, please see the Personal Invitation from Pendragon.txt file for the reason why. :)

Installation.

First you will want you will probably want to install Diablo II Lord of Destruction with D2SE Mod Manager, I recommend my Diablo II 1.13D Direct play upload which can be found hereFollow the instructions provided.

If you already have Diablo II Lord of Destruction installed you can use the installer provided to install D2SE Mod Manager or download it from here,and follow the instructions provided.

Once you have Diablo II Lord of Destrucion and the D2SE Mod Manager installed, extract the folder contained in D2Hackit D2ES.rar to the MODS folder 

To configure which D2Hackit modules you wish to use open D2Hackit.ini (found inside the D2Hackit D2ES mod folder),with Notepad. It's pretty self explanatory.:)

Included D2Hackit Eastern Sun Modules.

Autostocker - Automatically stocks items in multistocker/rerollingorb/rune stocker/etc

Autoextractor - Transmutes items in cube and removes result, repeats until inventory's full

Exp - Shows exp information

Filter - Item filter

Gamble - Gamble bot

Pick - Item picker

Ammo Guard - Ammo guard GREAT for use with Double Throw Barbarians, Javelin and Bow Amazons, lets you know when your axes/javelin/arrows are low. 

Shopbot - Teleports around shopping for crap 

Flee - Fast TP to town or fast quit when HP drops below a % that you can set in game. I usually set mine to flee when my hit points drop below 45%. To set type ".flee hp 45" without the quotation marks into the in game chat box.

AutoStockAutoExtract - Autoextractor -> EmptyCube -> AutoStocker -> Repeat

EmptyCube - Empty cube, used by asae

AutoReroll - Rerolls item until goodPrefix >= prefixCount and goodSuffix >= suffixCount See Affixes.zip for list of all affixes

AutoAccept - Auto accepts group invites

Hotkey - Drop to cube and transmute hotkey

Transmute - The transmute plugin (t.d2h) is pretty handy in changing your stocker to a desired output or changing it a specific amount of times. You can use it with .t count N to transmute the stocker N times or .t start partialName to transmute to a specific item type. Ex: .t start dra to transmute the multi stocker to have a Dragon stone output or .t start Sa to transmute the low rune stocker to have a Sa rune output.

RuneDowngrade - Downgrades runes in your inventory.

Enjoy!!
